column1: No one in our way now but you, Ichinose.
There's no longer any point. You've lost.
As expected of the Phantom Thieves...

I'm all out of tricks. Just finish me off quickly,
please.

Even still, I believe EMMA's answer is the only
way to save all mankind.

I'll only continue attempting to stop you until
I succeed. The one solution that guarantees
EMMA's defeat is my death.

This is between the two of them—
let's stay out of it.

Ichinose, you're no doll. You really do have
a heart.
Believing... you didn't have anyone anymore?

I made you to try and understand the heart!
Not some pathetic attempt to—

You have been locked in solitude ever since
you lost your parents.

Rather than empathize with you, the people
who should have cared for you treated you
like a lifeless doll.

You attempted to rationalize this treatment
by viewing yourself as truly heartless...

...is easier than admitting how your own
really feels.

But you were so scared of rejection that you
deluded yourself into your own lonely world.

No, that's not true! What could some program
like you know about—
Why else would you give me that directive!?

If I'm just some program written for emotional
analysis... Why that directive?

It's because you were lonely. You wanted to
know what was making you feel lonely.

You were told you had no heart and you
listened, because it was simpler to just
believe them!

You believed you could figure out the human
heart so you could make your own stop feeling
lonely!
You were just lonely! That's the real solution!
But, what's so wrong with that?

By acknowledging weakness, humans can begin
the path to changing themselves.
I may be an AI, but I was able to change.
You should be able to change too!
You should be able to comprehend the heart!

Ichinose, you told me to become a good
companion for humanity.

A good companion is one who takes your hand
and leads you back to the right path when you
fall astray.

Someone who will forge a path alongside you
if you cannot find your own.

Ichinose, I want to be that kind of companion
for you, too!

So please join me in finding the right path—and
if we can't, then let me help you forge one!
You have no reason to be lonely...
That's so weird... This hasn't happened before.
Yeah. She was able to change Ichinose's heart!
Sophie had to be the one to reach out to her.

Well, of course—a daughter's words cut the
deepest, ya know.
How are you holding up, Sophie?

To think even Sophie would awaken to a
Persona...

No surprise to me! Sophie's been learning all
about the heart this whole time.

I'm very sorry for hurting you all. That was not
being a good companion to humanity.

Yeah, don't let it bother ya! We're just happy
to see ya back to normal!
Mmhm! Bringing you back was worth it!
I can hear something deep inside me...

It's saying, "I want to stay with the Phantom
Thieves!"
And now... only one task remains.

Right, the Ark of the Covenant. This will have
all been for nothing if we don't stop it.
Ichinose, you wouldn't happen to know?
Wait! I can hear another voice!
It's the one I heard in the Okinawa Jail...

I recognize it now. It's EMMA's—it's the voice
of the Ark!

So it was speaking through a borrowed voice
just as we thought.

It's gathering the people... It says a god is nigh...
That their Desire will be granted!
Sophie, where's the voice coming from?
Not from within the Jail... Somewhere outside!
We need to find that voice.
Right, find it and show it what's up!
C'mon, Ichinose! You're comin' with us.
Let's go, Ichinose! There's no time to argue!
Ugh, would you give it a rest!?

Just shuddup and get with the program! We're
rescuin' you whether you like it or not!

A friend of Sophie's is a friend of ours! We're
not ditchin' anybody in this hellhole!

Just go with it, Ichinose. He dragged me up
from down in the dumps too.
